title: Pre-owned car market expected to touch 1.09 cr units by FY28: Report
description: India's pre-owned car market, as per the Indian Blue Book report, is expected to expand to 1.09 crore units valued at USD 73 billion by FY28, with budget buyers predominantly seeking quality cars for upgrading to a new pre-owned vehicle.
